item.description:
Come celebrate Valentine's Day with your tyke! For Tykes ages 21 months through 4 years old. Introduce your child to new rhythms and movements as we dance, play, and explore yoga in this fun filled class! This class will get both you and your tot moving.  Using different activities and creative props, your tiny dancing yogi will begin to develop fine and gross motor skills while improving balance and coordination. Our class will also teach the value of taking turns and working together

No yoga experience is required. Thank you for arranging just 1 parent/caregiver per family.

Cost: $15 includes 1 parent+1 child. (pre-payment required w/ YES RSVP).
A single YES RSVP will include you and your child.

Class will be taught by Amy Harper

Please note that we cannot refund or offer credit for schedule conflicts or unexpected illness.
item.name: Celebrate with Your Tyke: Valentine's Weekend Yoga Meetup
